website_summaries.verdict: Set of 3 (4", 5", and 6" tall) flameless LED candles made with real, vanilla-scented wax, that rotate among a variety of colors.
pros: Vanilla-scented real wax pillars  flicker like real candles, but without the danger of fire
Just like an actual candle but safer, can be used to create a festive or relaxing ambiance
Comes with handy, multi-function remote control, which includes an auto-off timer
Can be displayed together or separately, combined with other decorations for your own unique design
cons: Caution: Because they are made with real wax, they may melt under some conditions
Batteries (3 AAA for each candle) aren't included

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!! Truly amazing, love love love.
customer_reviews.text: These candles by far are the best!!! Absolutely love them❤❤❤ the lights can stay stuck on one color sometimes, but it's not difficult at all to get them going multi color again. The timer works, I'm ordering more. They bring such a pleasant atmosphere to my livingroom. The only thing that I can complain about is they are not very scented, however that is not why i ordered them, so i am completely satisfied with this purchase, and recommend purchasing them if you are looking to add some color to your space. 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love these whoever said they can't put them to different colors is wrong . I just got them put one in three separate rooms put one on blue one on green one on multi color and it's all working fine So the trick is to bring them into separate rooms turn the color on each one separate and then you can put them altogether all different colors I think that's pretty cool
customer_reviews.author: Kryztena F.

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier with the service I received and with the candles ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my mom as a Christmas present. Upon receiving the order from Amazon I opened the box to check them out. The middle candle was cracked in two different places. Instead of contacting Amazon, I replied to an email sent from the LED Lytes Co-founder, Peg, who had sent out an email after my order was initially placed. She immediately took action and had a replacement sent via two day shipping. I couldn't be happier with the service I received and with the candles themselves. They are real wax and look amazing! The different light colors will be beautiful and I know my mom will love these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look Fake
customer_reviews.text: Fun but not real looking at all. I was under the impression you could put these on a mode to make them look like a real flickering candle and that is not true. When I put them on the yellow light and hit "mode", the light flashes back and forth between yellow and green. When I put it on the orange/amber color and hit "mode", the light flashes between orange and blue. These might be fun for a dorm room or a party, but for my bedroom they look a little tacky. Maybe I got a dud.
customer_reviews.author: K Bfield

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome gift to myself! The company even contacted me to make sure all was fine. I thought the smaller candle wasn't working and they offered to replace it. Turns out it was just a battery issue!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Calderon

customer_reviews.title: I love the ambience that they create
customer_reviews.text: These LED candlesticks are ammmmaazing!!! I love the ambience that they create! For a more natural look, you can choose the yellowish color and they look like real candles.. And when you want to turn on the funk, you can choose any of the different colors or the "multicolor" option. I love turning on the multicolor option at different times for the three candles and it creates a lovely colorful effect! Don't hesitate!
customer_reviews.author: Abinaya

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I really underestimated the quality of these electric candles! I love the variety of colors and how it projects out so vividly, the 4hr and 8hr duration options, the mode of flickering (like an actual flame) and the ability to put it changing to every color. The remote has a wide range that reaches all the candles simultaneously (if done right) even if they're on different corners of an area or room; making it incredibly ease to use and access. I love these and couldn't be happier :)
customer_reviews.author: Ibn Hamid

customer_reviews.title: Great option instead of burning candles
customer_reviews.text: I have had LED type lights in the past and after 1 day the batteries would be dead and would replace and make sure everything was off and would be dead again the next day. I saw a few reviews that mentioned that so I waited a while before writing a review. We have had the candles for many months and are still on the original batteries. We recently put them in the Halloween pumpkins for some different colors and effects. The candles are very nice and like all the different colors. Some say there is a vanilla scent we did not note any scent with these candles. Happy with the price and the performance of these LED candles.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Candles came as expected. Some of the colors aren't as true as I might like (i.e. orange looks like the original "on" color). Didn't give 5 stars because my second set had a wax splotch on the large candle. Granted it does give it a more realistic look. Haven't had any issues with them melting in the sun like other "outdoor" candles have done.
customer_reviews.author: Emma B.

customer_reviews.title: Romantic
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful display of colors, I like the multi color button, and just enough lighting for when hubby and I are in bed and aren't ready to sleep, if you know what I mean. Sets the mood, and you have a handy remote next to you so that you don't have to get out of bed to switch them off. They also have an on and off switch on each one if you don't want to use all 3 or to save batteries as the slip in the box does say it helps to switch them off. The only bummer is that the box says they are vanilla scented and I got unscented, they don't smell like a thing.
customer_reviews.author: ChooseLove

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Candles look great, very realistic. I love that we can change the colors, and the flame can look like it is 'flickering' just like a real candle would. It's awesome that there's a remote control to change all the settings as well! Manufacturer states the candles are 'vanilla scented' however I cannot smell them, but this does not take away from the overall awesomeness of the candles. I've never liked fake candles, but I'm glad I got this set because we use them quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: TnTGoblin

customer_reviews.title: Flameless Multi color candles.
customer_reviews.text: These are the most beautiful, lifelike and unique candles I have ever owned. I have seen battery lit candles before but these even go through a series of colors...by remote control, no less!! If you would like a lifelike (even feels waxy), flickering, changing color (if you want and by remote), You have got to have this set of three; tall, medium and short, battery and remote control candles. They will stay lit 4 or 8 hours. I love them and hope this seller (LED Lytes) stays with Amazon, they have a great product and as always, Amazon is the best. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kenne Messer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful wax non-fire candles. Leaves no sooty residue on surroundings. Color of your choice.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool LED candles. Press the color selection on the remote and the candles change to the color of your choice. For Thanksgiving, we selected orange. Each table had a glowing orange candle surrounded by a handmade centerpiece. Lovely! I finally finished re-painting my ceilings where the multiple candles items I bought from Illuminations were located on walls in sconces or in beautiful candles holders. I did not realize it, but there was soot residue all over my ceilings as a consequence. No more real candles for me despite their ambiance. These candles do the job just as well and no sooty residue.
customer_reviews.author: R. Eye

customer_reviews.title: they actually changed colors and I like them better now
customer_reviews.text: The colors on these seemed quite odd at first--not natural shades at all, but after a month, they actually changed colors and I like them better now. ?? One has stopped working--could be just batteries, but all of them got batteries out of the same package. They don't look like real candles--the level of the "wick" is the same height from the bottom regardless of the height of the candle top. The timer feature is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nena B.

customer_reviews.title: Safety and Beauty
customer_reviews.text: I just received my 2nd order - I love these flameless candles. They're beautiful and SAFE to use in a variety of ways: as memorial candles, decorations, even night lights. The remote and timers allow 4hrs or 8hrs of "On" time, set a flicker mode, and change the "flame's" color - or colors! - if the user wants a an ever - changing colorful light show. I'm very pleased with this purchase, thanks Amazon! Update: these came in handy when Irma knocked out power, I'm glad we had them & that we gifted them to friends. LED adds lite w/o heat: a +++ with no A/C.
customer_reviews.author: Mikki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. I loved it so much I bought another set for myself plus the Pack of 10 Coloring Changing LED Flames tea lights. These candles are mesmerizing. These would also make a great gift as that is the way I started. Worth every penny if you enjoy peaceful, colorful and quiet moments in your life. Also my guests get caught up in them when visiting. Go for it, you won't be sorry
customer_reviews.author: virgo949

customer_reviews.title: The Colors They Are A-changing
customer_reviews.text: I would "love" these if they were more attractive when unlit, but one can't have everything. I love the color choices and of course the timer and remote are a bonus. I have used mainly inside of candle holders, rather than on pillar holders since they aren't as pretty unlit, but they are versatile and the battery life is not bad. Because the base color is white, the colors are more true than color changing candles that have a particular color as the base, so it is a bit of a trade off. That's why you need to think about where you are going to use these to decide if they're right for you.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ronk

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my teenage daughter as a gift. She initially loved it. But we found it difficult to set the colors with remote, unless you want them to all be the same color. I then we found that one of the candles kept turning on by itself. Which can be a little creepy in the middle of the night. So we have to make sure that the off switch is turned to the off position every night.
customer_reviews.author: California 1977

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when these flameless candles arrived. They worked very well for the first four weeks then the shortest one stopped working. I replaced the batteries but it still would not work. The two taller ones seemed to work fine. The following week I wanted to turn on the two working candles but they would not work either. I checked the batteries (still good) and tried multiple times but the candles would not turn on. I only had them on a maximum of two hours TOTAL for the time I owned them. The description and price were too good to be true! Avoid this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: 1 of 3 stopped working within 9 days
customer_reviews.text: Within 8 days, one of them had stopped working correctly, no matter how many fresh batteries I tried. I didn't have them on every day, either. Very disappointed - especially for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Art Collector

customer_reviews.title: VERY short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea, horrible cheap materials execution. These candles "burned out" after a few days of use, maybe 30-40 hours. After that, the colors that were used the most stopped working. So much for long-lasting LEDs. First the blue, then the red went, and all we had left was yellow ... promptly returned for a different set of LED candles, only to find they were manufactured by these same people. Ran into same quality issues there sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, defective product
customer_reviews.text: The candles have gone completely haywire less than 2 months after giving them as a gift. They don't turn on; or they turn off and on by themselves. Battery changes don't solve the problem. The remote changes the settings on the air purifier. Not the best product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled! I had a dark wall in my kitchen that I could not figure out how to light it without a bunch of cords hanging around and this worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: SuziQ

customer_reviews.title: I Hope Yours Worked Better Than Mine!

customer_reviews.author: Virginia Hatmaker

customer_reviews.title: These are fun! They are waxy like real candles
customer_reviews.text: These are fun! They are waxy like real candles, but of course they never melt. The LED flame is deep enough inside that they look real when you have them on the white color setting. Or you can easily switch them to a colored setting. Leave them set on one color, or set them on multi mode & they will change color every few seconds. The single remote works for all 3 candles: you just point the remote at whichever one you want to adjust. I use rechargeable batteries, so these are cheap to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles. I bought a set for myself and a set as a gift for a friend. They are very pretty and add a nice, warm ambiance to any room, whether a den, living room or bedroom. I think they will be a nice addition to a room during a cocktail or dinner party. I bought these in conjunction with the Amazon Basics AAA Performance Alkaline batteries. Wise decision. Each candle takes 3 AAA batteries. So it's nice to have the batteries around. My friend also loved them. You can make them solid colors or alternating multi colors. You can make them flicker or not.
customer_reviews.author: MarieC

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, works great

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves these lights. I do, too.

They are a great addition, especially the ability to change colors. I have had no problems with them though they can eat up some batteries if you use them a lot. "
customer_reviews.author: G.Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Give my room a great touch

You may have to press the button a couple times to get all three candles to do the same thing but they are so beautiful and worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff for candle lovers

customer_reviews.author: Brett Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas and one of the lights only works for about a minute and then turns off. I tried 2 sets of batteries and the same thing happens. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: You have to see it, then you're hooked!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for Mom. She likes led candles and just about anything with a remote. (I hid the TV remote, bad idea.) I was just curious about how they worked, so I gave it a shot. I'm really not in to candle things. I was somewhat impressed at the way they looked like real candles, then I started playing with the remote. This is when, (pardon the pun), they really shined! Flickering, color changing, and a timer. Okay, I was having fun playing, but had to stop to wrap it. Yes, I want one.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye Tee

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty and a great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter who loves candles. I for one get Leary with candles in our home lit Bc of our little ones so I bought her these. They are so pretty and change colors. It’s not only pretty but gives me peace of mind knowing they are so much safer than having lit candles in the room and they smell like vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Well Packaged, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: These are fun to have, especially around the holidays. You just click the remote to get different colors and various lighting effects, plus the timer feature insures that you don't forget to turn them off at the end of a party, etc.. The set arrived nicely packaged with no flaws whatsoever. I especially like that I don't have to worry about a fire and there's no messy melting wax to clean up. I used these inside three crystal and glass candleholders and they look fantastic. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Frank

customer_reviews.title: Remote Off Button does not work
customer_reviews.text: Very cute candles, my eight year old loves them. However, the Off button on the remote does not work at all so we have to turn them off manually. Such a bummer, half the appeal is the remote.
customer_reviews.author: SCole31

customer_reviews.title: So far 0/2 sets I’ve gotten worked...
customer_reviews.text: First set I ordered worked well for two days and then one of them changed color so that it will not match the other two and the tallest candle randomly started turning on and off. Ordered a replacement set and as soon as I opened them and turned them on the tall one won’t stay on. Tried replacing the batteries with no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great battery operated candles
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my teen daughter’s room. She loves them. Doesn’t use them as often as she says she would but she uses them.
customer_reviews.author: CDN in Hong Kong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my mother-in-law. She loves candles, but cannot take them out on the deck because of the ocean breeze. She LOVES these! The colors are amazing, the remote is simple to understand, and they're a great conversation piece! I will definitely keep these in mind for future gifts for others.
customer_reviews.author: Kasee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Adds a dimension of brightness to the room.
customer_reviews.text: These work fine, add a dimension of brightness to the room. The only negatives are the colors, really not true-to-light colors, but the three candles work fine, the remote works fine; can't really complain.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Still Way Worrh It, Even If You Need To Buy Batteries!
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles! They are multiple color and cool! Only down side is that each candle takes 3 AAA BATTERIES.... that’s another $10 in cost to make them work, but way work it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to get some of these, but wanted to pick up some in a store, rather than order online. But, they were sold out. So, I checked out Amazon. Came across these. Glad I did. They are exactly what I wanted. And not expensive at all. I love being able to switch color functions. And the timer comes in handy since I tend to fall asleep with them still on. Totally worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Flinton

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are quite nice. I like the color change options. There's also a steady or flicker option. They do use up batteries quickly if you leave them on auto for use with remote. I'm going try clicking them off this time. I mainly use them in fall and winter when the days are shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Wand

customer_reviews.title: We no longer can wait for the sun to set!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for evening lighting when one loves the ambiance created by softer hues of flickering candles. I can set the color to match up with themes for entertaining although I prefer the soft natural glow for most evenings. We do not have to worry about fires or pets, and enough light is cast out to be useful. There are numerous settings on the remote for color and intensity. I intend to purchase several more sets as gifts and to purchase more for our home.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Smart Looks, Smart Works - Great Flameless Candles
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We have only had them up and running for a few days and are still playing with the various colors and modes but they are truly delightful. The color palette is amazing, solid and flickering modes are a wonderful addition, and the real wax candles are so natural looking. Including a timer with both 4 and 8 hour selections was brilliant! For your next upgrade how about making them AI compatible with Alexa?
customer_reviews.author: lvschultz2

customer_reviews.title: great mood setter!
customer_reviews.text: It flickers like a real candle and has a scent to it. Remote is cheaply made but like the color changing features.
customer_reviews.author: Danibal

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these candles!!
customer_reviews.text: They are waxy so they look like real candles, just don't smoosh them because it will stay that way! There are tons of colors and options, I could play with them all day. Only complaint is they drain the battery while the lights are off unless you turn each candle off. Learned that the hard way, but that was the only time we replaced them in the almost year we have had them. They put off quite a bit of light when you spread them apart a bit, and the create great mood lighting ;)
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: It's scented!
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. I got these for my MIL for her birthday tomorrow, it's exactly what she has been wanting! It was just delivered and I opened the package. The box says it is scented with vanilla. The vanilla scent gives her a super bad headache. I just sent back through the listing and it doesn't say it's scented that I can find. I won't be able to give it to her.
customer_reviews.author: TrishaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I have to give Peg at LED Lytes much credit for great customer service. I was having some problems with my first shipment and contacted Peg about it. She apologized profusely and made arrangements to have another order shipped to me at no charge. I received the order and everything worked perfectly. The candles are beautiful and the customer service was perfect. Thanks again to Peg at LED Lytes. E. Winfrey
customer_reviews.author: E. Winfrey

customer_reviews.title: Great Kid's Room Decor
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter's room and she loves it. It is bright enough to replace her nightlight, so that's a plus too. One of the lights dies turn on on its own, so we are still trying to figure that out. Even so, our daughter loves how 'cute' her room looks now.
customer_reviews.author: SallyAJ916

customer_reviews.title: These candles are awesome! I love that you can choose the color
customer_reviews.text: These candles are awesome! I love that you can choose the color, or set them to change through the colors. I also love the flicker mode! It makes them look like real candles, and you don't have to worry about the house burning down while you're sleeping!
customer_reviews.author: Tammith

customer_reviews.title: Colorful candles.
customer_reviews.text: These candles are wonderful! I turned them on red and placed them in the window for Halloween. The red looked like orange through the window. My grandchildren (2 & 4) think they are "magic" because they change colors. It is nice to be able to set the colors individually or have them all the same color. I love the choice of colors. The remote works very well. I am so glad I bought these candles.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: Great nightlights
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for camp to use as nightlights for the kids. The remote works well, and I like that I can easily set each candle separately just by moving them a bit. The light is pretty directional, so these are more decorative than functional for any real light, but they serve their purpose for us. Also, if you're interested at all by the "faint vanilla scent," you will be disappointed. Unless you consider crayons to smell like vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: speeb

customer_reviews.title: candles
customer_reviews.text: I like using the multi-color style on the candles, looks nice while each one is changing
customer_reviews.author: C. Petty

customer_reviews.title: LED Lytes LLC Review, Outdoor Patio
customer_reviews.text: " Bought 2 sets for my outdoor kitchen. Absolutely love them and will be buying more. Easy setup and really like how they cycle thru the colors. I really like the fact you can order multiple sets and one remote works on all the sets (don't need a separate remote for each order) now I have extra remotes in case they go bad. Note: The picture attached does not reflect how great these lights look at night. Not sure how long the batteries last yet. Have not changed them out in past 2 months. Thanks.

I'm giving 4 of 5 stars because a.) they had no scent whatsoever, not vanilla, not anything; and b.) I almost bought a set where each candle could glow a seperate color at the same time. customer_reviews.text: And I really love the safe Flame-less candles- I use them as a nightlight, when I have company over and I've given them as gifts

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but the colored lights drain the batteries ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but the colored lights drain the batteries at least twice as fast as the regular Amber variety. The pink/purple light is just about all I use this set for. Red, green, and blue are extremely vivid. The Amber beige color is relaxing but drab, anddrains the batteries quickly. The yellow is more of a baby yellow, the orange is pale and horrible. If you are looking for orange candles, get the regular "amber" candles and save your battery life!
